subject: Re: [junit]
msgSnippet: rename your method to testXXX() ... i.e. testGetYear(); JUnit uses introspection to determine which methods are test cases, and the pattern testXXX() would be
messageBody:
rename your method to testXXX() ... i.e. testGetYear();

JUnit uses introspection to determine which methods are test cases, and the
pattern testXXX() would be recognised as a test method automatically.
Otherwise, you'd have to add the test method in manually.

----- Original Message -----
From: Tariq Qazi <tariq.qazi@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 16, 2001 2:49 AM
Subject: RE: [junit]


> No, my test method is
> getYearTest()
> Test class is
> DateTimeTest
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Vladimir Bossicard [mailto:vladimir@...]

> -Vladimir
